Control Name: SI-10 (5) RESTRICT INPUTS TO TRUSTED SOURCES AND APPROVED FORMATS
Control Statement: The organization restricts the use of information inputs to [Assignment: organization-defined trusted sources] and/or [Assignment: organization-defined formats].
